verses.text_madani: وَالذَّارِيَاتِ ذَرْوًا
verses.translation: I swear by the wind that scatters far and wide,

verses.text_madani: فَالْحَامِلَاتِ وِقْرًا
verses.translation: Then those clouds bearing the load (of minute things in space).

verses.text_madani: فَالْجَارِيَاتِ يُسْرًا
verses.translation: Then those (ships) that glide easily,

verses.text_madani: فَالْمُقَسِّمَاتِ أَمْرًا
verses.translation: Then those (angels who) distribute blessings by Our command;

verses.text_madani: إِنَّمَا تُوعَدُونَ لَصَادِقٌ
verses.translation: What you are threatened with is most surely true,

verses.text_madani: وَإِنَّ الدِّينَ لَوَاقِعٌ
verses.translation: And the judgment must most surely come about.

verses.text_madani: وَالسَّمَاءِ ذَاتِ الْحُبُكِ
verses.translation: I swear by the heaven full of ways.

verses.text_madani: إِنَّكُمْ لَفِي قَوْلٍ مُّخْتَلِفٍ
verses.translation: Most surely you are at variance with each other in what you say,

verses.text_madani: يُؤْفَكُ عَنْهُ مَنْ أُفِكَ
verses.translation: He is turned away from it who would be turned away.

verses.text_madani: قُتِلَ الْخَرَّاصُونَ
verses.translation: Cursed be the liars,

verses.text_madani: الَّذِينَ هُمْ فِي غَمْرَةٍ سَاهُونَ
verses.translation: Who are in a gulf (of ignorance) neglectful;

verses.text_madani: يَسْأَلُونَ أَيَّانَ يَوْمُ الدِّينِ
verses.translation: They ask: When is the day of judgment?

verses.text_madani: يَوْمَ هُمْ عَلَى النَّارِ يُفْتَنُونَ
verses.translation: (It is) the day on which they shall be tried at the fire.

verses.text_madani: ذُوقُوا فِتْنَتَكُمْ هَٰذَا الَّذِي كُنتُم بِهِ تَسْتَعْجِلُونَ
verses.translation: Taste your persecution! this is what you would hasten on.

verses.text_madani: إِنَّ الْمُتَّقِينَ فِي جَنَّاتٍ وَعُيُونٍ
verses.translation: Surely those who guard (against evil) shall be in gardens and fountains.

verses.text_madani: آخِذِينَ مَا آتَاهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ ۚ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا قَبْلَ ذَٰلِكَ مُحْسِنِينَ
verses.translation: Taking what their Lord gives them; surely they were before that, the doers of good.

verses.text_madani: كَانُوا قَلِيلًا مِّنَ اللَّيْلِ مَا يَهْجَعُونَ
verses.translation: They used to sleep but little in the night.

verses.text_madani: وَبِالْأَسْحَارِ هُمْ يَسْتَغْفِرُونَ
verses.translation: And in the morning they asked forgiveness.

words.translation: And in the hours before dawn

verses.text_madani: وَفِي أَمْوَالِهِمْ حَقٌّ لِّلسَّائِلِ وَالْمَحْرُومِ
verses.translation: And in their property was a portion due to him who begs and to him who is denied (good).

verses.text_madani: وَفِي الْأَرْضِ آيَاتٌ لِّلْمُوقِنِينَ
verses.translation: And in the earth there are signs for those who are sure,

verses.text_madani: وَفِي أَنفُسِكُمْ ۚ أَفَلَا تُبْصِرُونَ
verses.translation: And in your own souls (too); will you not then see?

verses.text_madani: وَفِي السَّمَاءِ رِزْقُكُمْ وَمَا تُوعَدُونَ
verses.translation: And in the heaven is your sustenance and what you are threatened with.

verses.text_madani: فَوَرَبِّ السَّمَاءِ وَالْأَرْضِ إِنَّهُ لَحَقٌّ مِّثْلَ مَا أَنَّكُمْ تَنطِقُونَ
verses.translation: And by the Lord of the heavens and the earth! it is most surely the truth, just as you do speak.

verses.text_madani: هَلْ أَتَاكَ حَدِيثُ ضَيْفِ إِبْرَاهِيمَ الْمُكْرَمِينَ
verses.translation: Has there come to you information about the honored guests of Ibrahim?

verses.text_madani: إِذْ دَخَلُوا عَلَيْهِ فَقَالُوا سَلَامًا ۖ قَالَ سَلَامٌ قَوْمٌ مُّنكَرُونَ
verses.translation: When they entered upon him, they said: Peace. Peace, said he, a strange people.

verses.text_madani: فَرَاغَ إِلَىٰ أَهْلِهِ فَجَاءَ بِعِجْلٍ سَمِينٍ
verses.translation: Then he turned aside to his family secretly and brought a fat (roasted) calf,

verses.text_madani: فَقَرَّبَهُ إِلَيْهِمْ قَالَ أَلَا تَأْكُلُونَ
verses.translation: So he brought it near them. He said: What! will you not eat?

verses.text_madani: فَأَوْجَسَ مِنْهُمْ خِيفَةً ۖ قَالُوا لَا تَخَفْ ۖ وَبَشَّرُوهُ بِغُلَامٍ عَلِيمٍ
verses.translation: So he conceived in his mind a fear on account of them. They said: Fear not. And they gave him the good news of a boy possessing knowledge.

words.translation: and they gave him glad tidings

verses.text_madani: فَأَقْبَلَتِ امْرَأَتُهُ فِي صَرَّةٍ فَصَكَّتْ وَجْهَهَا وَقَالَتْ عَجُوزٌ عَقِيمٌ
verses.translation: Then his wife came up in great grief, and she struck her face and said: An old barren woman!

verses.text_madani: قَالُوا كَذَٰلِكِ قَالَ رَبُّكِ ۖ إِنَّهُ هُوَ الْحَكِيمُ الْعَلِيمُ
verses.translation: They said: Thus says your Lord: Surely He is the Wise, the Knowing.

verses.text_madani: قَالَ فَمَا خَطْبُكُمْ أَيُّهَا الْمُرْسَلُونَ
verses.translation: He said: What is your affair then, O messengers!

verses.text_madani: قَالُوا إِنَّا أُرْسِلْنَا إِلَىٰ قَوْمٍ مُّجْرِمِينَ
verses.translation: They said: Surely we are sent to a guilty people,

verses.text_madani: لِنُرْسِلَ عَلَيْهِمْ حِجَارَةً مِّن طِينٍ
verses.translation: That we may send down upon them stone of clay,

verses.text_madani: مُّسَوَّمَةً عِندَ رَبِّكَ لِلْمُسْرِفِينَ
verses.translation: Sent forth from your Lord for the extravagant.

verses.text_madani: فَأَخْرَجْنَا مَن كَانَ فِيهَا مِنَ الْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: Then We brought forth such as were therein of the believers.

verses.text_madani: فَمَا وَجَدْنَا فِيهَا غَيْرَ بَيْتٍ مِّنَ الْمُسْلِمِينَ
verses.translation: But We did not find therein save a (single) house of those who submitted (the Muslims).

verses.text_madani: وَتَرَكْنَا فِيهَا آيَةً لِّلَّذِينَ يَخَافُونَ الْعَذَابَ الْأَلِيمَ
verses.translation: And We left therein a sign for those who fear the painful punishment.

verses.text_madani: وَفِي مُوسَىٰ إِذْ أَرْسَلْنَاهُ إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ بِسُلْطَانٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.translation: And in Musa: When We sent him to Firon with clear authority.

verses.text_madani: فَتَوَلَّىٰ بِرُكْنِهِ وَقَالَ سَاحِرٌ أَوْ مَجْنُونٌ
verses.translation: But he turned away with his forces and said: A magician or a mad man.

verses.text_madani: فَأَخَذْنَاهُ وَجُنُودَهُ فَنَبَذْنَاهُمْ فِي الْيَمِّ وَهُوَ مُلِيمٌ
verses.translation: So We seized him and his hosts and hurled them into the sea and he was blamable.

verses.text_madani: وَفِي عَادٍ إِذْ أَرْسَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمُ الرِّيحَ الْعَقِيمَ
verses.translation: And in Ad: When We sent upon them the destructive wind.

verses.text_madani: مَا تَذَرُ مِن شَيْءٍ أَتَتْ عَلَيْهِ إِلَّا جَعَلَتْهُ كَالرَّمِيمِ
verses.translation: It did not leave aught on which it blew, but it made it like ashes.

verses.text_madani: وَفِي ثَمُودَ إِذْ قِيلَ لَهُمْ تَمَتَّعُوا حَتَّىٰ حِينٍ
verses.translation: And in Samood: When it was said to them: Enjoy yourselves for a while.

verses.text_madani: فَعَتَوْا عَنْ أَمْرِ رَبِّهِمْ فَأَخَذَتْهُمُ الصَّاعِقَةُ وَهُمْ يَنظُرُونَ
verses.translation: But they revolted against the commandment of their Lord, so the rumbling overtook them while they saw.

verses.text_madani: فَمَا اسْتَطَاعُوا مِن قِيَامٍ وَمَا كَانُوا مُنتَصِرِينَ
verses.translation: So they were not able to rise up, nor could they defend themselves-

verses.text_madani: وَقَوْمَ نُوحٍ مِّن قَبْلُ ۖ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا قَوْمًا فَاسِقِينَ
verses.translation: And the people of Nuh before, surely they were a transgressing people.

verses.text_madani: وَالسَّمَاءَ بَنَيْنَاهَا بِأَيْدٍ وَإِنَّا لَمُوسِعُونَ
verses.translation: And the heaven, We raised it high with power, and most surely We are the makers of things ample.

verses.text_madani: وَالْأَرْضَ فَرَشْنَاهَا فَنِعْمَ الْمَاهِدُونَ
verses.translation: And the earth, We have made it a wide extent; how well have We then spread (it) out.

verses.text_madani: وَمِن كُلِّ شَيْءٍ خَلَقْنَا زَوْجَيْنِ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَذَكَّرُونَ
verses.translation: And of everything We have created pairs that you may be mindful.

verses.text_madani: فَفِرُّوا إِلَى اللَّهِ ۖ إِنِّي لَكُم مِّنْهُ نَذِيرٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.translation: Therefore fly to Allah, surely I am a plain warner to you from Him.

verses.text_madani: وَلَا تَجْعَلُوا مَعَ اللَّهِ إِلَٰهًا آخَرَ ۖ إِنِّي لَكُم مِّنْهُ نَذِيرٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.translation: And do not set up with Allah another god: surely I am a plain warner to you from Him.

verses.text_madani: كَذَٰلِكَ مَا أَتَى الَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِم مِّن رَّسُولٍ إِلَّا قَالُوا سَاحِرٌ أَوْ مَجْنُونٌ
verses.translation: Thus there did not come to those before them a messenger but they said: A magician or a mad man.

verses.text_madani: أَتَوَاصَوْا بِهِ ۚ بَلْ هُمْ قَوْمٌ طَاغُونَ
verses.translation: Have they charged each other with this? Nay! they are an inordinate people.

words.translation: Have they transmitted it to them
Have they transmitted it to them

verses.text_madani: فَتَوَلَّ عَنْهُمْ فَمَا أَنتَ بِمَلُومٍ
verses.translation: Then turn your back upon them for you are not to blame;

verses.text_madani: وَذَكِّرْ فَإِنَّ الذِّكْرَىٰ تَنفَعُ الْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: And continue to remind, for surely the reminder profits the believers.

verses.text_madani: وَمَا خَلَقْتُ الْجِنَّ وَالْإِنسَ إِلَّا لِيَعْبُدُونِ
verses.translation: And I have not created the jinn and the men except that they should serve Me.

verses.text_madani: مَا أُرِيدُ مِنْهُم مِّن رِّزْقٍ وَمَا أُرِيدُ أَن يُطْعِمُونِ
verses.translation: I do not desire from them any sustenance and I do not desire that they should feed Me.

verses.text_madani: إِنَّ اللَّهَ هُوَ الرَّزَّاقُ ذُو الْقُوَّةِ الْمَتِينُ
verses.translation: Surely Allah is the Bestower of sustenance, the Lord of Power, the Strong.

verses.text_madani: فَإِنَّ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا ذَنُوبًا مِّثْلَ ذَنُوبِ أَصْحَابِهِمْ فَلَا يَسْتَعْجِلُونِ
verses.translation: So surely those who are unjust shall have a portion like the portion of their companions, therefore let them not ask Me to hasten on.

words.translation: so let them not ask Me to hasten
so let them not ask Me to hasten

verses.text_madani: فَوَيْلٌ لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا مِن يَوْمِهِمُ الَّذِي يُوعَدُونَ
verses.translation: Therefore woe to those who disbelieve because of their day which they are threatened with.
